items.name: Rancher's Choice
items.desc: A classic Rancher's Choice burger with savory beef, cheddar cheese, fresh vegetables, all nestled in a hearty rye bun, topped with flavorful barbecue sauce.

items.name: Wheaty Chicken Bliss
items.desc: Indulge in the Wheaty Chicken Bliss, featuring succulent chicken, gouda cheese, crisp vegetables, all embraced by a wholesome whole wheat bun, complemented with zesty mustard-honey sauce.

items.name: Sesame Lamb Feast
items.desc: Experience the Sesame Lamb Feast, a delectable combination of lamb, feta cheese, vibrant vegetables, all enclosed in a sesame bun, enriched with tangy tomato sauce.

items.name: Potato Pork Gala
items.desc: Savor the Potato Pork Gala, featuring tender pork, gouda cheese, crisp vegetables, all embraced by a unique potato bun, enhanced with creamy sour cream sauce.

items.name: Multigrain Duck Elegance
items.desc: Indulge in the Multigrain Duck Elegance, featuring succulent duck, brie cheese, flavorful vegetables, all embraced by a multigrain bun, complemented with a luscious honey-mustard sauce.

items.name: Nutty Turkey Symphony
items.desc: Experience the Nutty Turkey Symphony, a harmonious blend of turkey, gruyere cheese, fresh vegetables, all enclosed in a unique prune-walnut bun, enriched with savory cipollini sauce.

items.name: Classic Frankfurter
items.desc: Indulge in the timeless Classic Frankfurter featuring a succulent beef sausage adorned with classic toppings like mustard, ketchup, and diced onions, all nestled in a soft bun.

items.name: Gourmet Bratwurst Delight
items.desc: Elevate your taste buds with the Gourmet Bratwurst Delight featuring a flavorful bratwurst sausage topped with sauerkraut, Dijon mustard, and caraway seeds, all embraced by a pretzel bun.

items.name: Chili Cheese Dawg
items.desc: Spice up your day with the Chili Cheese Dawg, a zesty sausage topped with chili, cheddar cheese, and chopped green onions, all enclosed in a sesame seed bun.

items.name: BBQ Bacon Ranch Dog
items.desc: Savor the richness of the BBQ Bacon Ranch Dog, featuring a savory sausage topped with crispy bacon, barbecue sauce, ranch dressing, and shredded lettuce, all embraced by a toasted bun.

items.name: Mexican Street Dog
items.desc: Take a flavorful journey with the Mexican Street Dog, a zesty sausage adorned with grilled jalapeños, diced tomatoes, onions, cilantro, and chipotle mayo, all wrapped in a corn tortilla.

items.name: Hawaiian Luau Dog
items.desc: Transport your taste buds to a tropical paradise with the Hawaiian Luau Dog, featuring a tropical sausage topped with a grilled pineapple ring, teriyaki glaze, crispy bacon, and green onions, all on a Hawaiian roll.

items.name: Crispy Nacho Bites
items.desc: Satisfy your cravings with Crispy Nacho Bites, a delightful combination of crunchy tortilla chips, melted cheddar cheese, zesty salsa, and creamy guacamole.

items.name: Spicy Buffalo Wings
items.desc: Ignite your taste buds with Spicy Buffalo Wings, featuring succulent chicken wings drenched in spicy buffalo sauce, served with cool blue cheese dressing and crisp celery sticks.

items.name: Mozzarella Sticks
items.desc: Indulge in the gooey goodness of Mozzarella Sticks, crispy on the outside and oozing with melted mozzarella cheese on the inside, served with savory marinara sauce.

items.name: Vegetable Spring Rolls
items.desc: Experience the freshness of Vegetable Spring Rolls, filled with a vibrant mix of cabbage, carrots, and bell peppers, perfectly seasoned with soy sauce.

items.name: Hummus Platter
items.desc: Delight your senses with the Hummus Platter, featuring creamy hummus paired with soft pita bread, crisp cucumber slices, and juicy cherry tomatoes.

items.name: Fruit Skewers
items.desc: Savor the sweetness of Fruit Skewers, a colorful assortment of strawberries, pineapple chunks, grapes, and kiwi beautifully arranged on skewers.

items.name: Classic Chicken Shawarma
items.desc: Indulge in the Classic Chicken Shawarma, featuring succulent grilled chicken, garlic sauce, tahini, fresh tomato, onion, all wrapped in soft pita bread.

items.name: Beef and Lamb Mix Shawarma
items.desc: Savor the rich flavors of the Beef and Lamb Mix Shawarma, a delicious blend of beef, lamb, tzatziki sauce, crisp cucumber, lettuce, all in a delightful flatbread.

items.name: Vegetarian Falafel Shawarma
items.desc: Enjoy the Vegetarian Falafel Shawarma, a delightful combination of crispy falafel, hummus, cabbage, fresh tomato, pickles, all nestled in soft pita bread.

items.name: Spicy Harissa Chicken Shawarma
items.desc: Experience a kick of spice with the Spicy Harissa Chicken Shawarma, featuring flavorful spicy chicken, harissa sauce, garlic mayo, crisp lettuce, red onion, all in a tasty flatbread.

items.name: Mediterranean Gyro Shawarma
items.desc: Embark on a culinary journey with the Mediterranean Gyro Shawarma, a blend of gyro meat, tzatziki sauce, fresh tomato, onion, lettuce, all wrapped in soft pita bread.

items.name: Turkish Doner Kebab Shawarma
items.desc: Delight in the Turkish Doner Kebab Shawarma, featuring doner kebab meat, yogurt sauce, crisp cucumber, fresh tomato, onion, all wrapped in lavash.

items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.desc: Savor the simplicity of the Margherita Pizza, topped with rich tomato sauce, melted mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, and a drizzle of olive oil.

items.name: Pepperoni Pizza
items.desc: Indulge in the classic Pepperoni Pizza, featuring a flavorful combination of tomato sauce, gooey mozzarella cheese, and savory pepperoni slices.

items.name: Vegetarian Supreme Pizza
items.desc: Experience a burst of flavors with the Vegetarian Supreme Pizza, topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, bell peppers, black olives, red onion, and mushrooms.

items.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
items.desc: Delight your taste buds with the BBQ Chicken Pizza, featuring tangy BBQ sauce, melted mozzarella cheese, grilled chicken, red onion, and cilantro.

items.name: Hawaiian Pizza
items.desc: Transport yourself to the tropics with the Hawaiian Pizza, topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, ham, and juicy pineapple.

items.name: Mushroom Truffle Pizza
items.desc: Indulge in luxury with the Mushroom Truffle Pizza, featuring truffle oil, melted mozzarella cheese, savory mushrooms, and a sprinkle of parmesan.

items.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
items.desc: Indulge in the rich and gooey Chocolate Lava Cake, made with luscious chocolate, butter, sugar, eggs, and a touch of flour for a decadent treat.

items.name: New York Cheesecake
items.desc: Experience the velvety delight of the New York Cheesecake, crafted with cream cheese, sugar, eggs, sour cream, and a hint of vanilla extract.

items.name: Tiramisu
items.desc: Savor the classic Tiramisu, a heavenly blend of ladyfingers soaked in espresso, layered with mascarpone cheese, and dusted with cocoa powder.

items.name: Strawberry Shortcake
items.desc: Delight in the freshness of Strawberry Shortcake, featuring sweet shortcake biscuits topped with fluffy whipped cream and fresh strawberries.

items.name: Mango Sorbet
items.desc: Cool down with Mango Sorbet, a refreshing treat made with luscious mango puree, sugar, and a hint of lemon juice for a burst of tropical flavor.

items.name: Pecan Pie
items.desc: Indulge in the warm and nutty Pecan Pie, crafted with a rich filling of pecans, corn syrup, brown sugar, butter, and eggs, all in a flaky crust.

items.name: Classic Marinara Sauce
items.desc: Enjoy the timeless taste of Classic Marinara Sauce, a savory blend of tomatoes, olive oil, garlic, basil, and oregano, perfect for pasta or pizza.
items.usage: Ideal for pasta dishes, pizzas, and as a dipping sauce.

items.name: Garlic Parmesan Alfredo
items.desc: Indulge in the rich and creamy Garlic Parmesan Alfredo, a luxurious combination of butter, heavy cream, garlic, parmesan cheese, and a hint of black pepper.
items.usage: Perfect for pasta, Alfredo dishes, or as a flavorful dip.

items.name: Spicy Chipotle Mayo
items.desc: Add a kick to your meals with Spicy Chipotle Mayo, a zesty blend of mayonnaise, chipotle peppers, lime juice, and cumin.
items.usage: Great for sandwiches, burgers, and as a spicy dipping sauce.

items.name: Sweet Teriyaki Glaze
items.desc: Savor the sweet and savory flavors of Sweet Teriyaki Glaze, crafted with soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, garlic, and a touch of cornstarch for thickness.
items.usage: Perfect as a glaze for grilled meats, stir-fries, and as a dipping sauce.

items.name: Zesty Pesto Sauce
items.desc: Elevate your dishes with Zesty Pesto Sauce, a vibrant blend of fresh basil, pine nuts, parmesan cheese, garlic, and olive oil.
items.usage: Ideal for pasta, sandwiches, and as a flavorful condiment.

items.name: Creamy Sriracha Aioli
items.desc: Spice up your meals with Creamy Sriracha Aioli, a creamy fusion of mayonnaise, sriracha sauce, garlic, and a hint of lemon juice.
items.usage: Perfect for dipping, as a spread, or as a flavorful topping.
